name: postman-client
description: Raju's Client - A modern, user-friendly API client similar to Postman

scripts.build:mobile: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && npx cap sync @capacitor-community/electron
scripts.run:electron: npm run build:electron && cd electron && npx electron .
scripts.run:electron-dev: npm run build:electron && cd electron && npm run electron:start-simple

author: Your Name
